snippet.title: Dungeon Defenders Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.onrpg.com/MMO/Dungeon-Defenders

Dungeon Defenders is a hybrid Action Tower Defense game by Trendy Entertainment. Combining action elements of the Unreal Engine with classic tower defense in a real time 3D world, this game pushes the limits of the gaming imagination to new levels!

www.onrpg.com
www.twitter.com/onrpg
http://www.facebook.com/pages/OnRPGcom/226541150723812
